short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance AnimeSchedule with a modern style, the functionality to change your anime list info from the main website and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance AnimeSchedule.net with more features like:
-Episode Control
-Crunchyroll skip buttons for recap, intro, credits and preview
-Easily update your anime episode progress from Crunchyroll.
-Show anime info by hover
-Remove ads
-Add custom column (for your lists like dropped, on hold, finished and other)
-Add custom streams for each anime
-Modern theme 
-Red time bar for unwatched episodes
-Keep Netflix/Crunchyroll streams only option
-Remove comments section
-Remove empty columns
-Hide dim screen on Crunchyroll player

Made by IG:a2h.k
